commit_scope: Keep hosted runner productive when idle by falling back from spec-gap task generation to flow-based next-unblock task generation (open spec/open idea), and self-heal non-PR execution repo paths when /app lacks a .git checkout.
evidence_refs: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_agent_runner_tool_failure_telemetry.py -k 'auto_generate_tasks_when_idle or resolve_repo_path_for_execution or ensure_repo_checkout_accepts_git_marker_file'
Hosted smoke: generated task_c25759f67d257f5f from open spec idea and task_165b580ce4baac1b from open idea; both picked by openai-codex:railway-runner-1

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: When pending/running/needs_decision counts are zero, runner first attempts spec-gap implementation task sync and then falls back to flow next-unblock task generation so work continues from open spec or open idea. For non-PR tasks, runner now self-heals to a fallback git checkout path when the configured repo path is missing .git metadata.
test_flows: idle runner + no open tasks -> create from spec gaps
idle runner + no spec gaps -> create from flow next unblock (open spec/open idea)
non-PR task execution path with non-git /app -> switch to fallback checkout clone path
